00024 #ifndef _ISOTOPEENVELOPEESTIMATOR_HPP_
00025 #define _ISOTOPEENVELOPEESTIMATOR_HPP_
00026 
00027 
00028 #include "Chemistry.hpp"
00029 #include "IsotopeCalculator.hpp"
00030  
00031 
00032 namespace pwiz {
00033 namespace proteome {
00034 
00035 
00036 /// Class used for calculating a theoretical isotope envelope for a given mass,
00037 /// based on an estimate of the elemental composition for that mass.  For peptides,
00038 /// the elemental composition estimate is based on the average elemental composition
00039 /// of amino acid residues.  Mass distributions are calculated on construction of the 
00040 /// object and cached for quick access.
00041 class IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator
00042 {
00043     public:
00044 
00045     struct Config
00046     {
00047         enum Type {Peptide}; 
00048 
00049         Type type;
00050         unsigned int cacheSize; 
00051         double cacheMaxMass;
00052         int normalization;
00053         const IsotopeCalculator* isotopeCalculator; // must be valid during construction only
00054 
00055         Config()
00056         :   type(Peptide), 
00057             cacheSize(10000),
00058             cacheMaxMass(100000), 
00059             normalization(IsotopeCalculator::NormalizeMass |      // monoisotopic == 0
00060                           IsotopeCalculator::NormalizeAbundance), // norm_2 == 1 
00061             isotopeCalculator(0)
00062         {}
00063     };
00064 
00065     IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator(const Config& config);
00066     ~IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator();
00067 
00068     Chemistry::MassDistribution isotopeEnvelope(double mass) const;
00069 
00070     private:
00071 
00072     class Impl;
00073     std::auto_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00074 
00075     // no copying
00076     IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator(const IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator&);
00077     IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator& operator=(const IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator&);
00078 };
00079 
00080 
00081 } // namespace proteome
00082 } // namespace pwiz
00083 
00084 
00085 #endif // _ISOTOPEENVELOPEESTIMATOR_HPP_
